Articles.Content:
I was looking in the ksp 0.13 assets folder and i found the KSP theme tune? (for those of you that don't know the theme tune was added in either 0.17 or 0.18 i can't remember)

Can anyone tell me why the ksp theme tune is there?
I think the current tune that plays in the main screen once was the credits song back in 0.13.
